snippet: Robbie Baillargeon and Charlie McAvoy scored first-period goals for Boston University, the defending Beanpot champion, which beat Northeastern. Boston College beat Harvard.
abstract: Boston University advances to Beanpot tournament final with 3-1 win over Northeastern.
lead_paragraph: Robbie Baillargeon and Charlie McAvoy scored first-period goals for Boston University, the defending Beanpot champion, which beat Northeastern. Boston College beat Harvard.

headline.main: Boston University and Boston College Advance to Beanpot Final
